website_summaries.verdict: This no-frills single DIN car stereo is great for streaming music from your phone, and the controls are incredibly simple. It’s the perfect budget car stereo for anyone who doesn’t need a CD player.
pros: It’s got a USB port, so you can easily play your own MP3 collection from a flash drive
Bluetooth hands-free calling is super simple
Delivers above-average sound for a stereo at this price
cons: It can browse music libraries on Android phones but not iPhones
It doesn’t have a CD player, and it doesn’t work with steering wheel controls

customer_reviews.title: Basic
customer_reviews.text: Installed in a 1993 Camaro. Easy to install. & I’m partially colorblind. I’ve got another pioneer head unit single din in my other car and this one doesn’t even come close to my other unit. You have only 1 custom eq of your choosing & on top of that you can only customize the treble & bass. If you like to do more customization in your audio settings, this unit isn’t the one for you. Also, I have to turn the volume up to 40-56 to get decent volume. Max volume is 62. Not what I was looking for. Good for people who don’t know much about car audio. Will update if anything goes south.
customer_reviews.author: Rizz

customer_reviews.title: Not perfect but pretty good
customer_reviews.text: All functionalities work well and the menu is intuitive enough. It connects to my iphone by bluetooth and calls work fine. I have to talk pretty loud, but my car is older and a bit noisy so that's probably why. The radio station preset buttons feel cheap and awkward - that's probably my biggest complaint. I had to call tech support and they were actually pretty helpful - I didn't expect that. The sound was cutting out intermittently, especially when the car went over bumps. They told me the unit goes into a "safe" mode when there is a short in a speaker. Sure enough, one of my speaker wires was bad inside the door.
customer_reviews.author: Balto McGrath

customer_reviews.title: Average
customer_reviews.text: This unit is fairly easy to install and figure out, but the biggest drawback is the display- 1980's grade text marquee that has to scroll several times just to show the title that's playing. The design is dated and tacky but the price is right. Another problem is the buttons- every button is really two or three buttons which makes it tricky to push what you want unless you lean your finger one way or the other. You have to push the buttons very hard to make them work also, and I find that irritating. The sound from the unit is good. The USB input function doesn't seem to really work.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Sokolay

customer_reviews.title: Lit
customer_reviews.text: Nice bought basically for the aux connection except when using the aux cord the time won't show and that's bothersome but that's my only issues. My car is old so it was a bitch to install especially since I have an anti theft system. But it's installed and now I Blair ice Cube arriving to school.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Nice replacement unit for tablet car mod!
customer_reviews.text: Works with the Axxess ASWC-1 without an issue! The rear USB allows me to power my tablet and stream to the unit via BT. Includes microphone for phone functions (have not tested yet). Track information is displayed with multiple display options. Function buttons (Next/Previous; phone, etc) are conveniently placed on the left side. Included remote works well, but with the Axxess unit, is not needed. Small footprint (NO CD player! THIS IS A DIGITAL MEDIA RECEIVER!) allows it to be installed in glove box or in a deep double DIN well, so I think this will work well for tablet modders. Sound without amplification sounds fine to me. In the brief time I've had it, it's a great unit!
customer_reviews.author: Cabbit

customer_reviews.title: Great unit for the price but display is too dim
customer_reviews.text: Great unit, but you have to spend some time with the setup. The instructions are fairly complete but are not exactly "Step 1, step 2, step 3" format so take some studying. Pros: Good sound; easy pairing with Bluetooth; Pandora "just works" automatically and it's nice to have Pandora controls, including the station list, right on the radio. Cons: Display is too dim to see during the day, and the most dimmed setting is still to bright at night. I miss having controls to adjust balance and tone--you can do this, but it's buried under a couple of menu layers so not accessible while driving, especially since you can't see the display very well in daylight.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Blyth

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Installed this unit in the cabin of my boat. I wanted something I could control with my Android phone from the upstairs bridge via Bluetooth. Now I don't have to climb down to adjust volume or change the selection. I just stream google music from my phone or tablet via Bluetooth, USB or AUX. Sound is good without an Amp. Couple of notes: - The installation guide is poorly written - USB and Aux jacks are on the back of the unit
customer_reviews.author: EC

customer_reviews.title: Fun Inexpensive and Small Stereo!
customer_reviews.text: Great unit! Love it to death. Hooked up a couple amps, a subwoofer and 4 new speakers and it sounds amazing. You've got Bluetooth audio, Bluetooth calling, USB iPhone support, auxiliary and of course the radio. The custom equalizer has two custom settings to perfect your sound whether you're listening to something techno/hip-hop like and rock.
customer_reviews.author: rifth

customer_reviews.title: -Inexpensive -Bluetooth connectivity works great. Easy to pair and reconnects at power-on quickly ...
customer_reviews.text: Pros: -Inexpensive -Bluetooth connectivity works great. Easy to pair and reconnects at power-on quickly -Customizable colors to match factory lighting. Cons: -Screen is *very* difficult to read during the day (lots of glare) -No illumination lead to auto-dim with headlights -Even on dimmest setting, I can see this unit in my rear-view mirror (reflecting off the rear window) in my Ranger.
customer_reviews.author: John Hilb

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Cheap, easy to install, good brand and a great start to building a system in your car.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Very nice receiver
customer_reviews.text: Great unit for the money. USB works great. Bluetooth works well with my Nexus 5. Radio reception is fair, not as good as another pioneer unit I have in m other car. I personally like the usb and aux in on the back. That way there isn't anything sticking out of the unit. Screen is nice, and it is pretty large for a din size radio. A dimmer hookup would have been a great addition but it isn't there. Sound is good and what you would expect from a pioneer.
customer_reviews.author: J. Cummings

customer_reviews.title: Great product. I've always been a fan of Pioneer ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I've always been a fan of Pioneer and am overall happy with this receiver. 1 - 10 with 1 very unsatisfied and 10 being very satisfied here are my options: *Overall = 9 - easy to read screen with tons of color options, face attaches and detaches with ease, Menu is ease to navigate, bluetooth works with my iPhone 6 running iOS 9 beta 3 (at time of review), fits aftermarket install kit nicely on 96 Acura Integra (no squeaks or sounds). Lost 1 point for me because I was disappointed that it didn't come with a protective cover for the detachable face.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Sugi

customer_reviews.title: well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best stereos I've ever bought. The last one I had on my car was a kenwood and don't get me wrong it was great for when I had bought it a few years ago but this one does blow it away (mostly because of all the new technology in this one compared to the old one) I don't miss the cd player anyone who has a good phone won't either. I can plug it via usb or bluetooth and the fact that this stereo has three rca outputs just makes it awesome and for the price you just can't beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Heraldo

customer_reviews.title: I have had it for months and it has worked perfectly for me and I couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.text: This unit is the business! I had a similar Pioneer unit in my car but had issues because my dash didn't really have enough depth to accommodate the unit, my microphone kept coming unplugged. Since this unit does not have a CD player, it is half the depth of a regular unit and it has the larger screen. I have had it for months and it has worked perfectly for me and I couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Big Case

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth doesn’t connect
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our boat and the Bluetooth doesn’t connect and the usb outlet doesn’t work either. So far the only think to work is the radio. Waste of my money
customer_reviews.author: Mjm

customer_reviews.title: Not So Impressed.
customer_reviews.text: Unit is 32 days old and 2 days beyond the ability to return. It has gone schitzo and randomly changes sources while listening. When it is working and tuned to FM the presets work at random as well. Sometimes they work... mostly they do nothing. It seems to be just getting worse with glitches.
customer_reviews.author: Bradford L

customer_reviews.title: Great for the cost, I recommend using AUX for music streaming!
customer_reviews.text: Product seemed to work great! My only complaint is that streaming my music through Bluetooth produced a pretty crappy sound quality (iPhone 7), however as soon as I switch to using the AUX input method the saiid quality was great! Great for a simple steep replacement if you need one. Nothing fancy, gets the job done right.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Smith

customer_reviews.title: Fairly easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for marine receiver for my boat and this one fit the bill. Fairly easy to use, I tinkered with it for maybe 10 minutes. Bluetooth hooked up easily enough. If there is a downside, the Bluetooth cuts out if my mobile device is much more than 30 feet away from the receiver. The USB and aux inputs are on the back, but they provide cables for both that you can use to run to a more easily accessible location if you need to use those.
customer_reviews.author: Blaine

customer_reviews.title: Great Media Receiver *No CD player*
customer_reviews.text: Great head unit with a lot of options on board. There are many different tuning capabilities that are included on this deck for the price point that it is amazing to me that it works so well. Pioneer really out did themselves on this one. The only complaints I have are the display, while it is larger (due to there being no CD player) it is difficult to read with the glare since it is a slick shiny plastic. other than that I wouldn't trade it for anything.
customer_reviews.author: G-man

customer_reviews.title: Great feature set
customer_reviews.text: Great feature set. Much smaller front to back without the CD player mechanism. Easy to use and hides your music collection USB thumb drive in the back. Has a screw to lock the detachable head to the unit. This is a really great radio (I have two) but like most unit is not bright enough to view in a convertible at all with the sun on it and sun glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Adkison

customer_reviews.title: Great mechless unit
customer_reviews.text: I really like the look of this unit in my car. It came with everything you need to install a microphone on your visit. Plenty of cord for the 3mm Jack usb cable and microphone. The interface was easy to get used to and looks good Pros: Lots of EQ adjustment not just bass mid and treble. Nice iPhone interface Cons: none
customer_reviews.author: Christina Roome

customer_reviews.title: This is a pretty nice unit
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty nice unit. I'm using it in a ski boat with blue tooth and it works great. The only issue is that it's hard to see the display in the bright sunlight (I think this is the case with most unit being used outside).
customer_reviews.author: condor7700

customer_reviews.title: Woks great
customer_reviews.text: Just installed and everything works great. It sounds great and the illumination options are cool. The only small gripe I have is that you have to run wires for the aux and usb inputs, but you know that when you buy it. Bluetooth connections and streaming work great. I haven't had a chance to test out calls yet. Overall it's hard to find such a nice head unit at this price point.
customer_reviews.author: Irish222222

customer_reviews.title: I expected more from a Pioneer product!
customer_reviews.text: The controls on this unit are not well designed and unlike other stereo systems you have to give serious effort into getting this thing do anything from connecting Bluetooth devises to changing the volume.
customer_reviews.author: Chance Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking
customer_reviews.text: I mostly use USB and it works with iPhone 5, and Nexus 4. I had to "clear cache" once with iPod Touch. I think the first strength of this HU is the price. I replaced my old Pioneer HU (was $200+) with this and they sounds similar. The second is able to change color. You can have one schema for the dimmer on and one for dimmer off, so it is closer to "factory look".
customer_reviews.author: CY

customer_reviews.title: Solid, reliable, easy to install, BT works great
customer_reviews.text: This was actually a cool little receiver. I put it in my 95 Tahoe 2 door, and the lack of depth made it really easy to install compared to a cd player. If you don't use cds anymore this will work great for your iPhone or Android. Sorry to say it was sold off with my old Tahoe, but I might pick one up again for my new OBS Tahoe.
customer_reviews.author: Dennydotco

customer_reviews.title: only had the radio since 1/20/16 and now the blue ...
customer_reviews.text: only had the radio since 1/20/16 and now the blue tooth cuts in and out every so offend and sometimes it makes a buzzing noise that can only be fixed by turning the radio off. emailed pioneer and was told they do not factory repair their radios and i would have to send it to a third party to get it repaired. so i will not be buying from pioneer again.
customer_reviews.author: Yimmajazzi

customer_reviews.title: excellent deal
customer_reviews.text: going through the menus can be a bit challenging; other than that it is a great deal. sounds good enough and has plenty of useful features. I would like however bass/mid/treble adjustments to have their own separate knob for immediate adjustment. seems most radios are doing away with that and going the software route (cheaper)
customer_reviews.author: tev123

customer_reviews.title: Nice unit
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice little unit and does a nice job. The bluetooth connection to my iPhone works beautifully. The only bad thing I've found is that the display is very difficult to read - in any color. The easiest to read is the blue color, but it's still difficult to see in the daytime.
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: Everything is great about this deck except for the display
customer_reviews.text: Everything is great about this deck except for the display. I love the rear USB, AUX and microphone port. It's easy to install yourself and everything works greats including the bluetooth. The only problem I have with it is the display. During the day it is very hard to see the display no matter what color you change it to. There are some that you can see better than others but there is still squinting involved.
customer_reviews.author: markimus

customer_reviews.title: Works great on my 2004 mini s
customer_reviews.text: No complaints to with this system. Works great on my 2004 mini s, but I had to rewire a new system because I had a Harmon kardon system previously
customer_reviews.author: Felipe A

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased with the sound quality and power compared to the ...
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the sound quality and power compared to the deck I replaced with this one. The Bluetooth is a little on the weak side but I also have this installed in an all aluminum dash on my boat, if it were in a car it would probably have better reception.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great fit in my bmw e36 no problem definitely would get wiring adapter and a little microphone this kir doesn't come with one it comes with a set of headphones..
customer_reviews.author: Tim pavlenko

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Head Unit
customer_reviews.text: This unit is extremely short front to back and doesn't get nearly as hot as other head units. No CD? Burn it to MP3 and put it on a large USB Flash Drive and get over it. This unit sounds great.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth problems with my Moto X and problem with it resetting itself
customer_reviews.text: After 3 months, I have had problems with the bluetooth phone functions with my Moto X (mic stops working). In addition, it is now doing a full reset sometimes, losing all my settings. I'm hoping it's a bad unit that I can get swapped out versus an incompatibility with my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: This stereo released hidden power out of my speakers!
customer_reviews.text: This stereo released hidden power out of my speakers. It has a good amount of setting and is easy to install, the only problem was how complicated the Bluetooth was to connect, but after I learned it was easy.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Nice and streamlined
customer_reviews.text: It's perfect, does everything I need it to do and I love having the ipod in the glove compartment instead of wired up to the front of the unit. The bluetooth speakerphone works pretty well with the external microphone and i find myself using it more and more.
customer_reviews.author: Explore

customer_reviews.title: Great unit at a Great price.
customer_reviews.text: Great system. I installed the unit in my Jeep Wrangler and it sound great and has all the capabilities you could ask for. The ability to talk hands free on my phone via bluetooth is great. The microphone sound quality is good even in the jeep.
customer_reviews.author: Coheeba

customer_reviews.title: This head unit is a great value. It is a cheap and simple way ...
customer_reviews.text: This head unit is a great value. It is a cheap and simple way to get handsfree bluetooth in your car, and stream from your phone to your car stereo. Sounds much better than my more expensive Alpine unit.
customer_reviews.author: J. Arenson

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect.  Amp required tho
customer_reviews.text: Works great and was easy to install. With the metra dash kit, it fits in my 2001 Infiniti QX4 perfectly. Took off one star though because you really need an amp with it. On the highway I have it on Max volume to hear books and calls.
customer_reviews.author: Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: Nice media player.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. No useless cd player (for me at least). Good buy. I like how you can customize the color of pieces individually.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Mcdonald

customer_reviews.title: Perfect head unit
customer_reviews.text: Perfect head unit! A little tricky to use, but once ya get use to it life is simple! The 3 preamp outputs was what I was chasing with no cd player function!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: Bluetooth seemed to play okay at first and now its saying no service. It's probably user error
customer_reviews.author: Tanit Barton

customer_reviews.title: Great affordable bluetooth deck.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this thing for the bluetooth capability. Sound quality is superb. I noticed a big difference from my Kenwood unit. So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Tony N.

customer_reviews.title: One star.
customer_reviews.text: Stereo stopped working just out of return date. Too many hoops to jump through to get a warranty replacement. No more third party purchases for me.
customer_reviews.author: Firechachi

customer_reviews.title: Love This
customer_reviews.text: Excellent unit, apps work flawlessly with my samsung SIII produces great power for stock speakers. and excellent cheap upgrade to any factory sound system.
customer_reviews.author: Tiny

customer_reviews.title: Everything work as advertise. Bluetooth signal is solid. ...
customer_reviews.text: Everything work as advertise. Bluetooth signal is solid. Would give it a 5 stars if the screen automatically dim at night.
customer_reviews.author: Thanh Pham

customer_reviews.title: Awesome company
customer_reviews.text: Came on time and would buy from this comapany again, thank you so much for the equipment. :) the install was easy and my car is a 1991 Buick regal, The bluetooth works great with my Samsung Galaxy Advant. I have my mp3s on the phone and listen to them via bluetooth while google maps just chimes in over the music no problem. The mic for the bluetooth is nice and people hear me clearly while driving, I mounted it on the automatic column shifter.
customer_reviews.author: Dale

customer_reviews.title: I like this unit a lot
customer_reviews.text: I like this unit a lot. It fit well in my old MG which didn't have the depth in the dash for a cd unit. Others expressed frustration with the menu being in the volume control, but that just hasn't been an issue for me. It's not really that sensitive, imo. I do wish it didn't need to try to run Pandora with sub though. I never use that program. Bluetooth is great.
customer_reviews.author: Shane A. Staley

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't come as pictured
customer_reviews.text: Seller lied, does not come with ear buds comes with cheap dollar store headphones. Stereo works ok
customer_reviews.author: Dakota

customer_reviews.title: rubbish
customer_reviews.text: I really hate this head unit. For starters the screen when in white is visible during the day but blinding at night. You can switch the color to red at night but then you're constantly switching back and forth. The controls are rubbish, spiky little things to forward the track and buttons placed so that you inadvertently hit the source button when trying to hit others. Sound is only so so and the unit overheats pretty badly. Overall I'd say they were going for someone who wants something that looks faux fancy and skimped severely on every other thing you'd want in a head unit. Avoid.
customer_reviews.author: G C

customer_reviews.title: Poor connectivity
customer_reviews.text: Bluetooth hardly ever connects. Most trouble I've ever had with a radio
customer_reviews.author: Jspurg

customer_reviews.title: Junk.
customer_reviews.text: Bluetooth audio is absolutely trash. Extremely dissatisfied. Definitely do not buy!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the Blutooth capability. It is a good little head unit.
customer_reviews.author: Herbie

customer_reviews.title: Liked it so much
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my son. Liked it so much, I bought another for me. Takes a bit to get used to the controls, but once you do, works and look great.
customer_reviews.author: R. Millard Hume

customer_reviews.title: Awesome receiver! I have my iPad mini as my ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome receiver! I have my iPad mini as my main audio source and it hooks into this Pioneer easily. The Bluetooth calling works very well also. Small microphone is placed near my visor .. And the calls are nice and clear. The receiver has a ton of options to change, equalizer, sub control, lighting, etc. Endless
customer_reviews.author: joe

customer_reviews.title: Awesome unit
customer_reviews.text: I've had it installed for about a month now and it's awesome. I'm just using the integrated amp in the head unit for now, and it puts out a very clear, clean sound to my 4 factory 6.5 inch speakers and four tweeters. I bought this because I haven't used CDs for audio in the car for a looooooooooong time and was tired of wires. The sound from the bluetooth streaming from the phone is very clear and the call quality is adequate. Highly recommend this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Have for some years already and works beautifully, no complains!
customer_reviews.author: Juan S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: WORKS GREAT AND I LOVE THE THIN DEPTH OF IT. WHO NEEDS A CD PLAYER ANYMORE. AWESOME
customer_reviews.author: matthew chatterson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice unit, don't really have any use for some of the display features. Bluetooth audio works great!
customer_reviews.author: Russ Knight

customer_reviews.title: This unit was easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: All the music I want to listen to is on my iPhone, days and weeks of it. This unit was easy to set up, easy to use, and taps into my iPhone. It easily replaced my 8 track and no more tapes to plug in AND it answers my phone through the car speakers. Whats not to love? If you like simple, clean and functional, this is the unit.
customer_reviews.author: xbusman

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: Works well, my son loves it. No CD slot on this one, thank God the CD era is over!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Geloso

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Good for a cheap media player. Clean sound, no problems.
customer_reviews.author: CSL Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Great stereo.
customer_reviews.text: Wish the aux port was built into the front but still a great stereo!
customer_reviews.author: ODB

customer_reviews.title: great media player
customer_reviews.text: Great lil radio bluetooth works great easy to tune eq and great if you have depth issues
customer_reviews.author: Tat2blk

customer_reviews.title: Generally happy with it so far
customer_reviews.text: Generally happy with it so far. I do get issues with the bluetooth dropping for a second every so often, but not a showstopper.
customer_reviews.author: Klink

customer_reviews.title: SWEET!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best HU ive ever bought. If you are shopping in the $100 range for a mechless, look no further.
customer_reviews.author: Kind

customer_reviews.title: Great sound display issues.
customer_reviews.text: I am a big fan of pioneer car stereos and why this unit has all of the great feature that of my previous units had the display could use some work. It is very hard to read in the day time. I sometimes have to use my hand to cover the glare. Everything else is fine,the blue tooth, USB rear, pandora, all are great I just have a problem with the display.
customer_reviews.author: lefty lemon

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: Unit quit working after less than 6 months in the car. Checked with Pioneer for warranty coverage and was declined coverage. It seems the unit was sourced from an un-authorized dealer, and thus no warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Linda K

customer_reviews.title: Installation was easy. Has all the features I want
customer_reviews.text: I am really enjoying this car stereo. Installation was easy. Has all the features I want. Bluetooth works great, synced easily with my iPhone.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory G. Mann

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: The best radio for my 1994 Wrangler, I've ever had! No skipping while off-roading!
customer_reviews.author: Flea

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great piece of technology. I love it. Easy to install and easy to operate. Looks great too.
customer_reviews.author: Silvestre rosas

customer_reviews.title: Acura
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought this as an upgrade for his car and he loves it. I like how the colors change while it is on.
customer_reviews.author: Marina Mills

customer_reviews.title: i bought second unit and after 2 months bluetooth broke ...
customer_reviews.text: i bought second unit and after 2 months bluetooth broke down (error -10). the first purchased unit also suffered from the same bt problem, but last me 2 years. I will never buy pioneer products again
customer_reviews.author: Mario Torres Lagos

customer_reviews.title: It's a good cheap head unit
customer_reviews.text: It's a good cheap head unit. Skips allot like a cd when it's turned up to 57, but it's digital? Funny, but it's works good besides that
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Armont

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great, easy to setup, replacing old din deck was a slice of pie
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: great sounding Bluetooth connection using phone and music
customer_reviews.text: Legit, great sounding Bluetooth connection using phone and music, easy to install yourself with minimal electrical experience.
customer_reviews.author: Marko C.

customer_reviews.title: It kicks ass
customer_reviews.text: This radio is very cool, did exactly what I wanted it to do. I tried an app radio a few months ago and it was the worst radio I have ever seen. But this one is very cool
customer_reviews.author: Marysa Dawn Okonek

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome head unit
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome head unit. It has all the feature you would ever need with out a touch screen.
customer_reviews.author: Nash Simon

customer_reviews.title: Great radio easy to install and sounds great bluetooth call ...
customer_reviews.text: Great radio easy to install and sounds great bluetooth call quality is good not great but the bluetooth audio is amazing
customer_reviews.author: john olive

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Good sound
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Good sound. Pairs with my iphone 6 without issue. As has been highlighted by other reviewers, the display can be tricky. There is brightness settings inside the menus so you have to find a balance between night and day display viewing.
customer_reviews.author: Robert B.

customer_reviews.title: Great receiver for the price
customer_reviews.text: It was a little hard to mount to my dash kit but other than that everything is perfect! Mic, USB cable and AUX are all included. Bluetooth sound quality is good, with low background noise pick up. No cons from me.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: Button lights do not dim. It works well for the most part, but occasionally glitches out.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is such a piece of crap. I can't believe how badly this simple device performs. I like all the odds and ends, but this can't even play bluetooth media correctly. About every 5 minutes the audio cuts out for a second or so, almost like a cd-skip for those that remember what that's like. Lately, it says it connects, but cannot control my phone's audio, nor is there any audio output (the built in spectrum analyzer that's worthless doesn't show anything). Just... Don't pay for this.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Venegas

customer_reviews.title: For the tech users
customer_reviews.text: The radio you want if you live off of your iPhone, built exactly for the iPod and iPhone. No CD in it, just run playlists off your iPod. Comes with microphone, makes everything hands free

customer_reviews.text: Ordered this just for the Bluetooth option and it was everything I wanted. Works perfectly with my android and my friends iphone's.

customer_reviews.title: Mine's a lemon
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine for a couple weeks, then suddenly no audio. Will work occasionally. Pulled it out, re-did the entire install very, very careful, same behavior. The unit operates normally, just no sound from any sources. Sometimes it works great. Fairly frustrating, totally random.

customer_reviews.title: I like it very much!
customer_reviews.text: I installed this in my 04 Grand Cherokee. It made the factory speakers setup sound even better. The hands free setup works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Guy Lagace

customer_reviews.title: I love how small it is
customer_reviews.text: I love how small it is, how well it fits my stock stereo location (2004 Honda Insight) and how it plays off my usb drive. I haven't even used the bluetooth option. It does have more options than I really need so maybe I should have just given it 4 stars. But once I have it set up the way I like it I try to just leave it alone.

customer_reviews.text: Works as expected. Nice colors and sound. Easy to install and wire. Great price tag and is east to operate.

customer_reviews.title: Great Receiver!
customer_reviews.text: A nice compact receiver. Plenty of options (almost too many). A little difficult to set up if you don't read the instructions, and that's the only reason I couldn't give it 5 stars. Bluetooth holds a strong connection

product_meta.title: Pioneer MVH-S215BT Stereo Single DIN Bluetooth In-Dash USB MP3 Auxiliary AM/FM Android Smartphone Compatible Digital Media Car Stereo Receiver With ALPHASONIK Earbuds
product_meta.description: Pioneer MVH-S215BT Stereo Single DIN Bluetooth In-Dash USB MP3 Auxiliary AM/FM Android Smartphone Compatible Digital Media Car Stereo Receiver With Free ALPHASONIK Earbuds
feature_bullets: The MVH-S215BT lets you enjoy hands-free calling and audio streaming in the car, courtesy of built-in Bluetooth. Other entertainment options include a front USB input, Aux-In and AM/FM radio.
Connect your Android smartphone to the front 1A powered USB input to play music on your phone, whilst also charging it.

Safely search and select artists, albums and playlists, using the Pioneer’s control buttons. A new feature has been added to support Android Open Accessory 2.0 (AOA 2.0), which is designed for Android 4.1 (or later) devices
Receive pristine sound from the MVH-S215BT’s built-in amplifiers with 4 x 50W of pure MOSFET power.
For even more power, you can use the 1 x RCA pre-out to hook up another stereo component, like a subwoofer or an extra amplifier for the rear speakers. PLEASE UPDATE THIS LISTING

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars395 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
